notes.title: Funding
notes.p: This research was partially funded by the Wrocław Medical University (statutory research ST 857), Wrocław University of Environmental and Life Sciences, Wrocław University, Foundation “Lower Silesian Pharmacy” and Wrocław Medical University Foundation. Publication was also supported by the Wroclaw Centre of Biotechnology under the Leading National Research Centre (KNOW) program for years 2014–2018 and National Science Center (Poland) [grant number 2015/19/B/NZ9/02971].
